item.description: St. Sarah's Parish will be hosting Pan's Labrynth as part of the Society's February Movie Night series. Pan's Labyrinth is a beautiful retelling of the Gnostic monomyth "The Hymn of the Pearl." Through the vehicle of mind-blowing visuals, we follow the soul as it goes through the process of awakening to the true reality of the world, and its eventual reintegration with the Godhead. Running time 119 minutes and rated R for violence and some language. Donation: $10/$5 TS members.

group.name: St. Sarah's Parish :: Gnostic Church and Discussion Group

item.name: Gnostic Movie Night
